snippet.title: PAYDAY 2: Black Cat Heist Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Vlad is furious after being kidnapped and tortured by the hands of the triad. It’s time for revenge! He wants the Payday gang to hit them where it really hurts, their floating casino on a cruise ship, where it just so happens that the  triad keep most of their cash reserves…  Make sure to dress up for the occasion, check out the new outfits! PAYDAY 2: Black Cat Heist and the Mega City Tailor Pack are now available on Steam!

Buy the Black Cat Heist: https://ovk.af/BlackCatYS
Buy the Mega City Tailor Pack: https://ovk.af/BlackCatYS2
Website: https://ovk.af/BlackCatYW
